send_phone_no: the registered signal number, that sends the information
recipients: phone number or ID (not internal ID) of a group chat
another phone number or ID (not internal ID) of a group chat
can also be a single phone number/group chat id if only one person should receive the message
mensa_id: the ID of the mensa, e.g. 1778 for https://openmensa.org/c/1778
session_file: name of the session.json file, e.g. session.json
